alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Coalinga - Avenal; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 10 at 9:39AM PST until February 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northern winds could gust up to 35MPH in western portions of the San Joaquin Valley. Sustained winds are expected to be 15-25MPH. * WHERE...Western portions of the San Joaquin Valley in central California. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
